#labels Actions
[AbstractSynchronizedAction SynchronizedAction] to set a property for any object to a specified value after some delay.

==Syntax==
{{{
new SynchronizedSetProperty(target:Object, key:String, value:*, offset:* = 0);
}}}

  * `target` - The object whose property you want to modify.
  * `key` - The name of the property to modify.
  * `value` - The new value of the property.
  * `offset` - The delay before the action executes.

==Example==
This example creates a text field and sets the text property after five seconds.
{{{
package {
	import com.mimswright.sync.*;
	import flash.display.*;
	import flash.text.*;

	public class SetPropertyDemo extends Sprite
	{
		public function SetPropertyDemo()
		{
			Synchronizer.initialize(this);
			
			var info:TextField = new TextField();
			info.autoSize = TextFieldAutoSize.LEFT;
			info.text = "Loading, please wait.";
			addChild(info);
			
			var showCompleteAction:SynchronizedSetProperty = new SynchronizedSetProperty(info, "text", "Loading Complete!", "5 seconds");
			showCompleteAction.start();
		}
	}
}
}}}
